short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Google Translate visible on every page in the side panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the Google Translate Open Sidepanel Extension!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Google Translate Open Sidepanel is an easy-to-use Chrome extension that keeps Google Translate just a click away. With this extension, you can quickly access Google Translate  without cluttering your browser tabs. Whether you’re looking for information or generating creative ideas, Google Translate will always be right there with you!

Key Features:
------------------------------
Quick Access: Instantly launch Google Translate  from the browser’s side panel.
No More Tab Clutter: Work with Google Translate directly in the side panel without switching between tabs.

User-Friendly Interface: Simple and elegant design for easy navigation.
Advanced Permission Control: Operates exclusively on the translate.google.com domain, ensuring a secure and controlled experience.

How to Use?
------------------------------
Add the extension to Chrome.
Click the Google Translate button in the side panel to start using it instantly!
Manage your ideas, questions, and projects effortlessly.

Why Choose Google Translate Open Sidepanel?
------------------------------
This extension is designed to boost your productivity and simplify access to Google Translate . It’s perfect for both personal and professional use. Make Google Translate an integral part of your browsing experience!
